price: 30. (Entonces, Lot) invocó a Al-lah diciendo: “¡Señor!, sálvame de (este) pueblo corrupto”.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
